main.name: Sakti Buana
main.description: I am a software engineer, not specialize in we development however I can use rails, flask, codeigniter, nodejs, expressjs, react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I am an agnostic for technologies, or programming languages, what matter wasn't the syntax but ability to understand in solving problems.
main.contactmessage: Let me know if you want to buy dates fruit, I always keep plenty stock of them, it taste very juicy and sweet enough, famous for its full benefit especially combined with goat milk or any milk for that matter. It helps to stay hydrated while coding.
